Package it.unipr.ingegneria.api

Interface IStoreManager<T>

Type Parameters:
T - Generic Parameter
All Superinterfaces:
IWarehouseManager<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
WineShop
public interface IStoreManager<T>
extends IWarehouseManager<T>
The IStoreManager extends the IWarehouseManager adding additional behaviour for manage the elements.
Author:
Ruslan Vasyunin, Francesca Rossi, Everton Ejike
See Also:
